resources.string:
Hivobung is a simple calculation application used to calculate the volume of a cylinder so that someone can find out the contents or volume of a cylinder. 

This application is made to make it easier for someone to calculate the volume or contents of a cylinder.

Here are some examples of objects in the form of cylinders:
Let\'s calculate the volume of a cylinder! Enter the following data:

The result of calculating the volume of the cylinder 

Radius: %1$s m
Height: %2$s m

Result: %3$,.2f m³

The result of calculating the volume of the cylinder 

Diameter: %1$s m
Height: %2$s m

Result: %3$,.2f m³
